misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires registration endpoint at POST /api/auth/register, but code implements it at POST /api/auth/signup
Spec requires MISSING_FIELDS error code for missing required fields, but login endpoint uses MISSING_CREDENTIALS instead
Spec requires 'Add Task' button label in task input section, but code displays 'Create' button instead
Spec requires displaying actual user's name from session in dashboard header, but code uses hardcoded mock user data ('User', 'user@example.com')
Spec requires error response format with nested structure {error: {code, message}}, but frontend incorrectly accesses data.error as string instead of data.error.message, causing error display issues
